solution_line_template: Larry spends {minutes_per_half_hour} * {walk_frequency} = <<{minutes_per_half_hour}*{walk_frequency}={walking_minutes}>>{walking_minutes} minutes per day walking his dog.
Larry spends {minutes_per_hour} / {feeding_divisor} = <<{minutes_per_hour}/{feeding_divisor}={feeding_minutes}>>{feeding_minutes} minutes every day feeding his dog.
Larry spends {walking_minutes} + {feeding_minutes} = <<{walking_minutes}+{feeding_minutes}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes per day on his dog.
